Monday, May 8, 2023.Breakfast: Eggs Basquaise - Soft scrambled eggs with sautéed peppers, onions, and tomatoes, flavored with espelette pepper, served on toasted sourdough.
Monday, May 8, 2023.Lunch: Polenta Squares with Provolone and Prosciutto - Pan-fried polenta squares topped with melted provolone cheese and crispy prosciutto, garnished with fresh basil.
Monday, May 8, 2023.Dinner: Sous Vide Duck Breast with Cherry Sauce - Perfectly cooked duck breast using a sous vide machine, pan-seared skin and finished with a cherry sauce reduction. Served with roasted Brussels sprouts and potatoes.

Tuesday, May 9, 2023.Breakfast: Italian Breakfast Frittata - A frittata filled with mushrooms, red bell peppers, onions, and spinach, mixed with fontina cheese, and cooked in a convection oven.
Tuesday, May 9, 2023.Lunch: Basque Chicken Sandwich - Roasted chicken with caramelized onions, piquillo peppers, and aioli on a crispy French baguette.
Tuesday, May 9, 2023.Dinner: Instant Pot Osso Buco - Tender and flavorful beef shank braised in red wine, orange zest, and a tomato-based sauce, served with creamy polenta.

Wednesday, May 10, 2023.Breakfast: Spinach and Gruyère Croissant Strata - Buttered croissants layered with baby spinach and Gruyère cheese, soaked in an egg mixture, and baked to golden perfection.
Wednesday, May 10, 2023.Lunch: Spanish Tortilla Sandwich - A hearty sandwich using Spanish omelet slices made from eggs, onions, and potatoes, served on ciabatta bread with tomato and lettuce.
Wednesday, May 10, 2023.Dinner: Wok-Seared Skirt Steak with Chimichurri Sauce - Marinated skirt steak seared in an outdoor wok, served with a zesty chimichurri sauce, and accompanied by grilled vegetables.

Thursday, May 11, 2023.Breakfast: Piperade Scramble - Scrambled eggs with sautéed onions, red bell pepper, and a hint of smoked paprika, served on buttered toast.
Thursday, May 11, 2023.Lunch: Chicken Caprese Sandwich - Sliced grilled chicken on a ciabatta bun with fresh mozzarella, sun-dried tomatoes, fresh basil, and balsamic glaze.
Thursday, May 11, 2023.Dinner: Tarragon Wine-Braised Chicken - Chicken thighs braised in white wine, tarragon, and garlic, served with a side of sautéed green beans and roasted fingerling potatoes.

Friday, May 12, 2023.Breakfast: Monte Cristo Waffles - Savory waffles made with diced ham, melted Swiss cheese, and a hint of Dijon mustard, topped with a fried egg.
Friday, May 12, 2023.Lunch: Mediterranean Chicken Wrap - Sliced roast chicken, tomatoes, cucumber, roasted red peppers, and hummus, wrapped in a warm flatbread.

Saturday, May 13, 2023.Breakfast: Euro-American Breakfast Hash - A combination of crispy diced potatoes, bacon, and bell peppers, topped with a fried egg and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
Saturday, May 13, 2023.Lunch: Turkey Pesto Ciabatta - Sliced turkey breast, roasted red pepper pesto, and tomato slices on toasted ciabatta bread.
Saturday, May 13, 2023.Dinner: Sous Vide Pork Tenderloin with Caramelized Onion Gravy - Pork tenderloin cooked in a sous vide machine, finished in a skillet, and covered with a caramelized onion gravy. Served with roasted butternut squash and steamed broccoli.

Sunday, May 14, 2023.Breakfast: Western Omelette - A fluffy omelette filled with diced ham, bell peppers, onions, and cheddar cheese, served with a side of whole wheat toast.
Sunday, May 14, 2023.Lunch: Smoked Turkey & Swiss Cheese Baguette - Hearty baguette filled with smoked turkey slices, Swiss cheese, and crisp lettuce and tomato, drizzled with honey mustard.
Sunday, May 14, 2023.Dinner: Outdoor Wok Paella - A twist on the traditional Spanish rice dish, cooked in an outdoor wok, with chicken, Spanish chorizo, bell peppers, and peas in saffron-infused chicken broth.
Sunday, May 14, 2023.Dessert: Vanilla Pound Cake - Store-bought vanilla pound cake.
